sentences.english: It~s bitter, sour and peppery, but also sweet.
sentences.chinese: 这是苦的，酸和暴躁，而且甜。

sentences.english: Istead of smiling, each of them made a face.
sentences.chinese: 他们没有笑，而是每个人都做了个苦脸。

sentences.english: It was absolute hell trying to get this report finished on time.
sentences.chinese: 要准时完成这份报告可真是苦差使。

sentences.english: Eg: Peeling bags of potatoes is really a chore.
sentences.chinese: 削一袋又一袋洋芋皮真是苦差使。

sentences.english: Even though the dukkha that manifests itself is ever so slight, it is enough to make us suspicious.
sentences.chinese: 尽管苦的表现如此细微，却足以引起我们的怀疑。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a method for determination of the total flavonoids contents in Complex Prescription Kudouzi Granules.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立测定复方苦豆子颗粒中总生黄酮含量的方法。

sentences.english: I study the way it seems a bit bitter ?
sentences.chinese: 我的求学之路好象有点苦呢？

sentences.english: Only in the respiratory status of life between the breath does not come, things go much to suffer.
sentences.chinese: 况人生只在呼吸之间，一口气不来，下去便很苦了。

sentences.english: Day didn't drop in my case, so bitter I mind, labor I bones and muscles.
sentences.chinese: 天没降大任于我，照样苦我心智，劳我筋骨。

sentences.english: The love is not bitter, Know with love.
Happiness and suffering are both created by one's own mind.
sentences.chinese: 天上人间樂与苦，自心造作自身受。

sentences.english: So much the worse for me, that I am strong.
sentences.chinese: 因为我是强壮的，对于我就格外苦。

sentences.english: He suffered a great deal in his childhood, but he died a millionaire.
sentences.chinese: 他小的时候很苦，但去世时是一个百万富翁。

sentences.english: You want to feel very hard, because I know that there is no return.
sentences.chinese: 想你的感觉很苦，因为知道那是没有归期的。

sentences.english: Sweet and hard from the outside, appreciated the well-being comes from the mind.
sentences.chinese: 苦和甜来自外界，体味幸福则来自内心。

sentences.english: I'll extract wholesome medicines from Mrs Dean's bitter herbs;
sentences.chinese: 我要从丁太太的苦药草里吸取有益的药品。
